quote: He crouched at the car window and looked in. 'What a lovely family you have. What a charming family. They're all lovely. Except for that one.' His finger jabbed the glass. 'That one's a bit ugly.
quote_letters: HE CROUCHED AT THE CAR WINDOW AND LOOKED IN WHAT A LOVELY FAMILY YOU HAVE WHAT A CHARMING FAMILY THEYRE ALL LOVELY EXCEPT FOR THAT ONE HIS FINGER JABBED THE GLASS THAT ONES A BIT UGLY
